description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国飞行员、政治人物，曾任中国人民解放军空军指挥学院副院长、中华全国妇女联合会副主席，拥有中国人民解放军空军少将军衔。
description.en: A Chinese pilot and politician, she formerly served as the Deputy Dean of the PLA Air Force Command College and Vice Chairperson of the All-China Women's Federation, holding the rank of Major General in the PLA Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省的城市。
description.en: A city in Liaoning Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，是中国共产党领导的社会主义国家。
description.en: A country in East Asia, it is a socialist state led by the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军空军指挥学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军指挥学院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的中级指挥院校，隶属中国人民解放军空军。
description.en: An intermediate command academy of the People's Liberation Army Air Force, subordinate to the PLA Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导下的中国各族各界妇女的全国性群众组织。
description.en: A national mass organization for women of all ethnic groups and from all walks of life in China, under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 张家口机场空中相撞事故

zh-cn: 张家口机场空中相撞事故

description.zh-cn: 1982年发生于河北张家口机场的一次空中撞机事故。
description.en: A mid-air collision incident that occurred at Zhangjiakou Airport in Hebei in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的空军武装力量。
description.en: The aerial warfare service branch of the People's Liberation Army of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓连是中华人民共和国的飞行员。
description.en: Liu Xiaolian is a pilot of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军空军指挥学院

description.zh-cn: 刘晓连担任中国人民解放军空军指挥学院副院长。
description.en: Liu Xiaolian served as the Deputy Dean of the PLA Air Force Command College.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓连曾担任中华全国妇女联合会副主席。
description.en: Liu Xiaolian previously served as the Vice Chairperson of the All-China Women's Federation.

relationships.source: 张家口机场空中相撞事故

description.zh-cn: 刘晓连在该事故中成功应对突发状况。
description.en: Liu Xiaolian successfully handled the emergency situation during this incident.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓连是第六届和第七届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: Liu Xiaolian was a deputy to the 6th and 7th National People's Congress.
